review module¶

class review.Review(user_id, product_id, date, score, text)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class representing a single review. :param user_id: user id :type user_id: str :param product_id: product id :type product_id: str :param date: date of review :type date: str :param score: score of review :type score: float :param text: text of review :type text: str :param sentiment: sentiment of review obtained from TextBlob :type sentiment: float

Cluster-based social network analysis for review graph
